      • Attack

        public Attack(HumanPlayer p_attacker,
              HumanPlayer p_defender,
              Country p_src,
              Country p_target,
              int p_numArmies,
              MapEditor p_map)
        the constructor for the Attack class
        Parameters:
        p_attacker - the player who attacks
        p_defender - the player who defends
        p_src - the source country which attacks initiates from
        p_target - the target country
        p_numArmies - the number of armies to send from source country to target for battle
        p_map - the loaded map of the game

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
        executes the attack method upon validation it's a one on one battle between soldiers in an army. if the attacker soldier gets higher than 60% change and the defender gets lower than 70%, attacker wins. if the attacker soldier gets less than 60% change and the defender gets lower than 70%, its a tie. if the attacker soldier gets higher than 60% change and the defender gets higher than 70%, defender wins if the attacker soldier gets higher than 60% change and the defender gets higher than 70%, defender wins the winner of the battle gets random Orders card for special orders
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Order

      • valid

        public boolean valid()
        check the validy of the map. if the uponents has the diplomacy card you shall not attack them. source country shouldn't be owned by the country number of armies in the battle are limited to the already existing armies in the source country
        Specified by:
        valid in interface Order
        Returns:
        true if the above conditions are satisfied

      • printOrder

        public void printOrder()
        prints the details in the orders
        Specified by:
        printOrder in interface Order
